{"id":793243057,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1662489628,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/793243057/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 0;\n        if(s.length() == 1){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        \n        HashMap<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        int max = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = left; right < s.length();right++){\n            if(!map.containsKey(s.charAt(right))){\n                map.put(s.charAt(right),1);\n                max = Math.max(max, map.size());\n            }\n            else{\n        \n                map.clear();\n                i++;\n                right = i;\n                \n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
